remarks: Lemma for ~ emcl .  By the previous lemmas, ` F ` and ` G ` must approach a common limit, which is ` gamma ` by definition.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jul-2014.)
statement:
emcl.1 $e |- F = ( n e. NN |-> ( sum_ m e. ( 1 ... n ) ( 1 / m ) - ( log ` n ) ) ) $.
emcl.2 $e |- G = ( n e. NN |-> ( sum_ m e. ( 1 ... n ) ( 1 / m ) - ( log ` ( n + 1 ) ) ) ) $.
emcl.3 $e |- H = ( n e. NN |-> ( log ` ( 1 + ( 1 / n ) ) ) ) $.
emcl.4 $e |- T = ( n e. NN |-> ( ( 1 / n ) - ( log ` ( 1 + ( 1 / n ) ) ) ) ) $.
emcllem6 $p |- ( F ~~> gamma /\ G ~~> gamma ) $.
$d H m $.
$d T m n $.
$d m n $.
